
monitor-instances
*****************


DESCRIPTION
===========

Enables monitoring for a running instance.


SYNOPSIS
========

   aws ec2 monitor-instances
     --instance-ids <value>


REQUIRED PARAMETERS
===================

"--instance-ids"  (list of string)
   The list of Amazon EC2 instances on which to enable monitoring.

   *Parameter Syntax*

      ["string", ...]


OPTIONAL PARAMETERS
===================

None
